name: Introduction to Polynomial Commitments
description:
We'll go through polynomial commitments, touching on the main ideas from:

* https://vitalik.ca/general/2021/01/26/snarks.html#please

* https://dankradfeist.de/ethereum/2020/06/16/kate-polynomial-commitments.html

* https://vitalik.ca/general/2021/11/05/halo.html#background-how-do-inner-product-arguments-work
